title: Minimum and Maximum Value Calculation
description:
FT_MIN_MAX stores the minimum and maximum value of an input signal
IN and provides these two values at the outputs of MN and MX until cleaï¿¾red by a reset. A reset sets MN and MX on the reset applied input values.
name: FT_MIN_MAX

input.name: in
input.description: The input value for which the minimum or maximum is to be calculated.

input.name: rst
input.description: A reset flag that, when true, resets the minimum and maximum values.
